Player History
Drafted in 8th round, 226th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2009...
Injured on 5/20/2011 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 5 days...
Injured on 7/27/2014 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 8/1/2017, off Earl Lipton (NYN)...
Traded from Atlanta to Kansas City on 4/12/2019 (Going to ATL: SS B. Camuñas. Going to KCA: 2B J. Kogut)...
Released by Kansas City on 6/16/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 6/16/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $412,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/9/2023 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
